Reviews.Title: “Perfect combination of price, quality and location!”
Reviews.Author: Maryana L
Reviews.Content: nice hotel situated centre rome approximately 15 min walk railway station rated 1 2 star hotel nice lobby friendly receptionists free internet access happy hour 6 till 8 free champagne snacks clean nice furniture minibar disadvantage front desk building 1 min walk internet provided rome defenetly bes option

Reviews.Title: “Perfect quaint hotel with quality, elegance and hospitality”
Reviews.Author: Kahuna8899
Reviews.Content: referred wonderful hotel heart rome bit suspicious due affordable price arriving finding elegant lobby helpful staff escorted adjoining building exactly comfort expected ammenities hotels elevator wifi lobby happy hour free wine snacks included breakfast highly recommend hotel picasso tell paul referred live aloha paul

Reviews.Title: “Good value for the money”

Reviews.Content: bit strange reception desk street didnt mind clean simple furniture beds welcoming hours walking city helpful breakfast ok pastries juices coffee didnt mind ate breakfast tiny location definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice location,terrible bathroom, jacket stolen from room”

Reviews.Title: “Excellent price, excellent location”
Reviews.Author: kbel
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel five nights paid euros night low price rome suite bathroom clean heard buzzer complained reviews included breakfast simple croissants filled cereal yogurt fresh fruit juice choice coffee location centrally located close metro stations close restaurants safe night stay

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Picasso, Only OK”
Reviews.Author: Travellers_in_20s
Reviews.Content: stayed june 2010 picked hotel tight budget looking cheap cheerful chose hotel online reviews majority claimed hotel ok hotel firstly hotel appears overflow hotel caravaggio street check ok budget paying budget prices air conditioning properly heat rome city june air conditioning comfort awful lot mosquitoes didnt anymore comfortable arrival didnt exactly warm welcome soaked skin rain wait check guests checking brought street floor separate building houses hotel picasso staff converted guest price charged effort internet access lobby hotel caravaggio street held happy hour evenings location ok via nazionale main street shops restaurants piazza della repubblica top besides attractions walk personally stay tell friends money spend hotel look elsewhere worth money stayed hotels italy deal half money keeping mind rome recomment hotel

Reviews.Title: “DON'T EVER STAY HERE!”
Reviews.Author: vacation-travel-love
Reviews.Content: absolutely awful arrived rome week italy staff rude pushy totally unaccommodating couldnt walk bed crashing bathroom door didnt website smoking dont believe stank stale cigarette smoke ash tray nightstand bed wasnt bed cots shoved neither support left dead sank foot sat lost equivalent day dealing fiasco arose hotel including chaos resulted checked luckily found alternative night stay albergo santa chiara hotel stones throw pantheon services location staff professional couple dont wholly unacceptable truly awful experience

Reviews.Title: “very good but noisy”

Reviews.Content: nice clean hotel bit expensive option breakfast service highly sufficient main noise stayed floor hear street outside night terrible walking visiting walking walking rome feel tired sleep baby
